short_desc: Members of the City Council are elected by district.  Councilmembers in Districts 1, 4, 7, and 8 serve until November 30, 2014. Councilmembers in Districts 2, 3, 5, and 6 serve until November 30, 2016. The Mayor serves a four-year term. The next election .....more
description: Members of the City Council are elected by district.  Councilmembers in Districts 1, 4, 7, and 8 serve until November 30, 2014. Councilmembers in Districts 2, 3, 5, and 6 serve until November 30, 2016. The Mayor serves a four-year term. The next election for Mayor will be November 4, 2016.
